mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USER_PK, DISPLAY_NAME, GENDER, BIRTH_YEAR, BIRTH_MONTH, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME ) VALUES ( #{userPK}, #{displayName}, #{gender}, #{birthYear}, #{birthMonth}, NOW(3), NOW(3) )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_PK, DISPLAY_NAME, GENDER, BIRTH_YEAR, BIRTH_MONTH, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME FROM USER WHERE USER_PK=#{value};
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET DISPLAY_NAME=IFNULL(#{displayName},DISPLAY_NAME), GENDER=IFNULL(#{gender},GENDER), BIRTH_YEAR=IFNULL(#{birthYear},BIRTH_YEAR), BIRTH_MONTH=IFNULL(#{birthMonth},BIRTH_MONTH), MODIFY_TIME=NOW(3) WHERE USER_PK=#{userPK};
